mapper.insert: insert into member ( num, id, password, name, phone, email, zipcode, addr1, addr2 ) values ( MEMBER_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ID}, #{PASSWORD}, #{NAME}, #{PHONE}, #{EMAIL}, #{ZIPCODE}, #{ADDR1}, #{ADDR2} )
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{ID} AND block = 'N'
SELECT NAME, EMAIL, BLOCK FROM MEMBER WHERE NAME = #{NAME} AND EMAIL = #{EMAIL}
SELECT ID, PASSWORD, BLOCK FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{ID} AND NAME = #{NAME} AND EMAIL = #{EMAIL} AND BLOCK = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(EMAIL) FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{EMAIL}
SELECT NUM, ID, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ZIPCODE, ADDR1, ADDR2, GRADE, JOIN_DATE, BLOCK FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{loginId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET ID = #{ID}, NAME = #{NAME}, PASSWORD = #{PASSWORD}, PHONE = #{PHONE}, EMAIL = #{EMAIL}, ZIPCODE = #{ZIPCODE}, ADDR1 = #{ADDR1}, ADDR2 = #{ADDR2} WHERE ID = #{ID}
